issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
A newer version of org.junit.platform:junit-platform-launcher than 1.5.2 is available: 1.11.0
A newer version of org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine than 5.5.2 is available: 5.11.0
A newer version of org.junit.vintage:junit-vintage-engine than 5.5.2 is available: 5.11.0
This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with `@com.squareup.kotlinpoet.DelicateKotlinPoetApi` or `@OptIn(markerClass = com.squareup.kotlinpoet.DelicateKotlinPoetApi.class)`
